l:dependency.name: Jenkins Maven Release Plug-in Plug-in
l:dependency.l:description: A plug-in that enables you to perform releases using the maven-release-plugin from Jenkins.

l:dependency.name: CLI
l:dependency.l:description: Commons CLI provides a simple API for working with the command line arguments and options.

l:dependency.name: Maven Plugin API
l:dependency.l:description: The API for plugins - Mojos - development.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM AccuRev Provider
l:dependency.l:description: SCM Provider implementation for AccuRev (http://www.accurev.com/).

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Bazaar Provider
l:dependency.l:description: SCM Provider implementation for Bazaar (http://bazaar-vcs.org/).

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM API
l:dependency.l:description: The SCM API provides mechanisms to manage all SCM tools.

l:dependency.name: Maven Repository Metadata Model
l:dependency.l:description: Per-directory local and remote repository metadata.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Subversion Provider - SVN Executable Impl.
l:dependency.l:description: Executable library for SCM SVN Provider.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM CVS Provider - Common library
l:dependency.l:description: Common library for SCM CVS Provider.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Clearcase Provider
l:dependency.l:description: SCM Provider implementation for Clearcase (http://www-306.ibm.com/software/awdtools/clearcase/).

l:dependency.name: Maven Invoker
l:dependency.l:description: A component to programmatically invoke Maven.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Starteam Provider
l:dependency.l:description: SCM Provider implementation for Starteam (http://www.borland.com/us/products/starteam/index.html).

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM TFS Provider
l:dependency.l:description: A Maven 2 SCM Provider for Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server.

l:dependency.name: Maven Model Builder
l:dependency.l:description: The effective model builder, with inheritance, profile activation, interpolation, ...

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM CVS Provider - CVS Executable Impl.
l:dependency.l:description: Executable implementation for SCM CVS Provider.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Visual Source Safe Provider
l:dependency.l:description: SCM Provider implementation for VSS (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/vstudio/aa700907.aspx).

l:dependency.name: Plexus Interpolation API
l:dependency.l:description: The Plexus project provides a full software stack for creating and executing software projects.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Mercurial (Hg) Provider
l:dependency.l:description: SCM Provider implementation for Mercurial Hg (http://www.selenic.com/mercurial/wiki/).

l:dependency.name: Maven Release Manager
l:dependency.l:description: Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project's build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Manager for Plexus
l:dependency.l:description: SCM Plexus component.

l:dependency.name: JDOM
l:dependency.l:description: JDOM is, quite simply, a Java representation of an XML document. JDOM provides a way to represent that document for easy and efficient reading, manipulation, and writing. It has a straightforward API, is a lightweight and fast, and is optimized for the Java programmer. It's an alternative to DOM and SAX, although it integrates well with both DOM and SAX.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM CVS Provider - CVS Java Impl.
l:dependency.l:description: Java implementation for SCM CVS Provider.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Git Provider - Common library
l:dependency.l:description: Common library for SCM Git Provider.

l:dependency.name: Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Synergy Provider
l:dependency.l:description: SCM Provider implementation for Synergy (http://www.telelogic.com/corp/products/synergy/index.cfm).

l:dependency.name: Maven Artifact Manager
l:dependency.l:description: Maven is a project development management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model: builds, dependency management, documentation creation, site publication, and distribution publication are all controlled from the declarative file. Maven can be extended by plugins to utilise a number of other development tools for reporting or the build process.

l:dependency.name: jaxen
l:dependency.l:description: Jaxen is a universal Java XPath engine.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Perforce Provider
l:dependency.l:description: SCM Provider implementation for Perforce (http://www.perforce.com/).

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Git Provider - Git Executable Impl.
l:dependency.l:description: Executable implementation for SCM Git Provider.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Standard Providers
l:dependency.l:description: Parent for all SCM providers supported.

l:dependency.name: Plexus :: Component Annotations
l:dependency.l:description: Plexus Component "Java 5" Annotations, to describe plexus components properties in java sources with standard annotations instead of javadoc annotations.

l:dependency.name: Ganymed SSH2 for Java
l:dependency.l:description: Ganymed SSH2 for Java is a library which implements the SSH-2 protocol in pure Java

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Subversion Provider - Common library
l:dependency.l:description: Common library for SCM SVN Provider.
